2025-05-09.description: Chevron, Exxon Mobil and TotalEnergies are among other big oil companies that could be considering a deal for BP, a report said Friday.

2025-05-14.title: TotalEnergies to Sell 50% Stake in Polish Biogas Unit to HitecVision
2025-05-14.description: TotalEnergies SE agreed to sell a 50% stake in its Polish biogas production business to Norwegian investment firm HitecVision AS as part of the oil major’s strategy to boost return on its renewables investments.
